'''Flawless Strategy''' is [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]]'s [[Passive Talent]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*The 100% decrease in [[CRIT Rate]] simply subtracts that amount from Sangonomiya Kokomi's overall CRIT Rate value.
*It is still possible for Sangonomiya Kokomi to perform a Critical Hit as long as her total CRIT Rate exceeds 0%.

==Trivia==
*The Chinese name of the talent translates to {{Lang|"Temple-Stratagem is Thorough"|zh=庙算无遗|zh_rm=Miào Suàn Wú Yí}}. This exact phrase appears in a poem by the Chinese poet {{w|Bai Juyi}} (772–846),<ref>Wikisource: [https://zh.wikisource.org/zh/%E5%A4%A7%E7%A4%BE%E8%A7%80%E7%8D%BB%E6%8D%B7%E8%A9%A9 大社觀獻捷詩]</ref> but the concept itself likely comes from {{w|Sun Tzu}}'s ''{{w|The Art of War}}'',<ref>Wikisource: [https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/The_Art_of_War_(Sun)/Section_I The Art of War]<br>''夫未戰而廟算勝者、得算多也。''</ref> meaning that a strategist must make a thorough and complete stratagem to win a war certainly, if it is a nationally important plan such as one made in an ancestral temple (a custom in ancient China).
